info.name: Eagle Bank API - Complete Test Suite with Transfers
info.description:
Comprehensive REST API test collection for Eagle Bank covering all requirements from the Take Home Test v2.

Includes:
- All core endpoints (Users, Accounts, Transactions)
- Transfer feature with complete test coverage
- Authentication flows (Login, Refresh, Logout, Change Password)
- Account status management (Active, Frozen, Closed)
- Advanced analytics endpoints
- Admin operations
- Audit trail endpoints
- Complete error scenarios with expected status codes
- Full user lifecycle flows
- Organized test scenarios for compliance testing
